entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
